job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: We are excited to announce that we are looking for a second Software Engineer to join our team Hank! Hank aims to build the largest retirement home network by bringing all the amenities of an independent living home into our aging loved one’s homes. We've raised close to 7M from top investors and are looking for an experienced engineer to join and help us build an excellent team and product.About youhave 4+ years of experience building modern web apps in a production settinghave proficiency with React and the surrounding ecosystemare comfortable iterating on backend applications with relational databasesare excited to collaborate with non-engineer teammates to envision features and solutionsare empathetic towards the needs of users who may be dissimilar from themselvesare comfortable working independently to design, build, and ship featureswill be motivated to learn and share ownership of our full tech stackInterested? Find out more here: https://angel.co/company/gethank/jobs/1431025-software-engineer
